description:
The associated bywash(es) shall be no more than <<distance in metres>> from the intake screen and take at least <<volume as a percentage (normally between 2 and 10%)>> of the <<intake/design>> flow.
“ Approach velocity” or “through slot velocity” is the water velocity perpendicular to and 10 centimetres upstream of the screen at National grid reference <<xx >> marked <<xx>> on the map.
